decisions.name: Does_a_Ban_List_Record_Exist
decisions.label: Does a Ban List Record Exist?

Flow.description: Check the Communication Ban object for a matching record. If it exists, immediately blacklist the Lead, mark it as Unqualified and have it lookup to the Communication Ban.

formulas.name: frmPhone
formulas.expression: IF( BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone}, " ", ""), "+45"), SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone}, " ", ""), IF( BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone}, " ", ""), "45"), "+" & SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone}, " ", ""), IF( AND( NOT(BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone}, " ", ""), "+45")), OR( TEXT({!$Record.Market_Unit__c}) = "DFJ_DK", TEXT({!$Record.Market_Unit__c}) = "Testamente_DK" ) ), "+45" & SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone}, " ", ""), IF( AND( NOT(BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone}, " ", ""), "+")), OR( TEXT({!$Record.Market_Unit__c}) = "DFJ_DK", TEXT({!$Record.Market_Unit__c}) = "Testamente_DK" ) ), "+" & SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone}, " ", ""), IF( BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone}, " ", ""), "+46"), SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone}, " ", ""), IF( BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone}, " ", ""), "46"), "+" & SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone}, " ", ""), IF( AND( NOT(BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone}, " ", ""), "+46")), TEXT({!$Record.Market_Unit__c}) = "FA_SE" ), "+46" & SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone}, " ", ""), IF( AND( NOT(BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone}, " ", ""), "+")), TEXT({!$Record.Market_Unit__c}) = "FA_SE" ), "+" & SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone}, " ", ""), IF( BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone}, " ", ""), "+353"), SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone}, " ", ""), IF( BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone}, " ", ""), "353"), "+" & SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone}, " ", ""), IF( AND( NOT(BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone}, " ", ""), "+353")), TEXT({!$Record.Market_Unit__c}) = "Ireland" ), "+353" & SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone}, " ", ""), IF( AND( NOT(BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone}, " ", ""), "+")), TEXT({!$Record.Market_Unit__c}) = "Ireland" ), "+" & SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone}, " ", ""), SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone}, " ", "") ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) )

formulas.name: frmPhone2
formulas.expression: IF( BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone2__c}, " ", ""), "+45"), SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone2__c}, " ", ""), IF( BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone2__c}, " ", ""), "45"), "+" & SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone2__c}, " ", ""), IF( AND( NOT(BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone2__c}, " ", ""), "+45")), OR( TEXT({!$Record.Market_Unit__c}) = "DFJ_DK", TEXT({!$Record.Market_Unit__c}) = "Testamente_DK" ) ), "+45" & SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone2__c}, " ", ""), IF( AND( NOT(BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone2__c}, " ", ""), "+")), OR( TEXT({!$Record.Market_Unit__c}) = "DFJ_DK", TEXT({!$Record.Market_Unit__c}) = "Testamente_DK" ) ), "+" & SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone2__c}, " ", ""), IF( BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone2__c}, " ", ""), "+46"), SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone2__c}, " ", ""), IF( BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone2__c}, " ", ""), "46"), "+" & SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone2__c}, " ", ""), IF( AND( NOT(BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone2__c}, " ", ""), "+46")), TEXT({!$Record.Market_Unit__c}) = "FA_SE" ), "+46" & SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone2__c}, " ", ""), IF( AND( NOT(BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone2__c}, " ", ""), "+")), TEXT({!$Record.Market_Unit__c}) = "FA_SE" ), "+" & SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone2__c}, " ", ""), IF( BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone2__c}, " ", ""), "+353"), SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone2__c}, " ", ""), IF( BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone2__c}, " ", ""), "353"), "+" & SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone2__c}, " ", ""), IF( AND( NOT(BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone2__c}, " ", ""), "+353")), TEXT({!$Record.Market_Unit__c}) = "Ireland" ), "+353" & SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone2__c}, " ", ""), IF( AND( NOT(BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone2__c}, " ", ""), "+")), TEXT({!$Record.Market_Unit__c}) = "Ireland" ), "+" & SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone2__c}, " ", ""), SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone2__c}, " ", "") ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) )

Flow.interviewLabel: RT - Lead: Check Ban List Before Saving New Leads {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}

recordLookups.name: Get_Communication_Ban
recordLookups.label: Get Communication Ban
recordLookups.filterLogic: (1 AND 2) OR (3 AND 4) OR (5 AND 6) OR (7 AND 8)
